item.title: [PI] JackPot Mini-Game[PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

here… it’s a start, I admire that you at least tried, and really want to learn.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("playjackpot")) { c.sendMessage("If you guess the amount in the pot you win 50m!"); c.sendMessage("Type ::guess item to play!"); } if(playerCommand.startsWith("guess")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ", 2); int amount = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); JackPot.Playjackpot(amount); }

[code=java]package server.model.minigames;

import server.model.players.Client;

public class JackPot { 

	
/**
* @author Imsuperman05
* Jackpot
* @version 1.0
*/
	static Client c;
	/**
	 * 
	 * @param Client
	 */
	public JackPot(final Client Client) {
		JackPot.c = Client;
	}
	
	/**
	 * 
	 * @param amount
	 */
	public static void Playjackpot(int amount) {
	final int number;
	number = amount;
		JackPot.c.sendMessage("Guess the ammount in the Pot.");
	        JackPot.c.sendMessage("If you get the number right" +
			" you earn that ammount of cash!");
		JackPot.c.sendMessage("Hint: Its between 1M and 100M");
            if(number != 50000000) {
            	JackPot.c.sendMessage("You picked " + number + ".");
            	JackPot.c.sendMessage("You guessed wrong.");
            }else if(number == 50000000) {
            	JackPot.c.sendMessage("You are awesome! You picked" +
            			" the right ammount.");
            	JackPot.c.sendMessage("You got " + number + " cash!");
            	JackPot.c.sendMessage("You are The JackPot Winner!");
            	JackPot.c.getItems().addItem(995, number);
            }
    }

}[/code]

Read full topic

When you type “guess ********” it tells you that you got it wrong if it wasnt 50M or you got it right if it was 50M
and if you got it right you got 50M
Do you see now??
